Mike Pence was one of three heavyweight candidates considering the race.

Eric Schmidt also took on Google's competition with Apple. Google partners with Apple, he said, on search, maps and YouTube. It competes, of course, on phones. Google also might in theory compete with Apple's Macintosh computer business with its Chrome OS hardware that Google hopes` to announce later this year,' Eric Schmidt said, Adam Lashinsky reports.''` Steve Jobs is absolutely brilliant,' said Eric Schmidt , referring to Steve Jobs , CEO of Apple, where Eric Schmidt was a longtime board member.'( He's) the most successful CEO in

n't panic. They made veteran plays. The Memphis Grizzlies were hurt by their youth. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I think a game like this is going to help us down the road.'' Elias Says Allen Iverson
